duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and process attorney billing in compliance with client guidelines and firm policies.
Ensure accurate and timely submission of invoices to clients.
Resolve billing-related inquiries and discrepancies promptly and professionally.
Collaborate with attorneys and staff to gather necessary billing information.
Monitor and update billing rates and timekeeper information as required.
Generate various billing reports and analyses for internal and client reporting purposes.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in legal billing.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; associate or bachelor's degree preferred. Certification in legal billing or accounting is advantageous.
